# Government Tender Announcement: Community Residential Facility (CRF) - Pacific Region

**Notice ID**: PW-22-01017163
**Publication Date**: December 13, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: December 30, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

## Background

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has a requirement for a Community Residential Facility (CRF) in the Pacific Region. The CRF will provide residential services to adult offenders released into the community on conditional release, statutory release, or under Long-Term Supervision Orders.

## Scope of Work

The CRF will provide 24-hour residential services, including:

* Accommodation and meals for offenders
* Monitoring and support for offender reintegration into the community
* Crisis management and personal support
* Community integration and social rehabilitation services
* Static and dynamic security services
* Reporting and record-keeping

## Requirements

* A minimum of 2 years of experience in working with adult offenders on conditional release
* A minimum of 2 years of experience in providing accommodation to offenders in a residential setting
* Compliance with CSC's Commissioner's Directives and applicable legislation
* Washroom paper consumption must meet green government standards
* Compliance with Security Requirements Check List and Security Guide

## Statement of Capabilities

Suppliers interested in providing the CRF services are invited to submit a statement of capabilities demonstrating their qualifications and experience. The statement must clearly show how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

## Important Dates

* Closing date and time for statement of capabilities: December 30, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* Contact person: Danielle Cameron, Manager/Team Leader, (343) 542-9350, danielle.cameron@csc-scc.gc.ca

**Contact Information**

* Name: Danielle Cameron
* Title: Manager/Team Leader
* Email: [danielle.cameron@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:danielle.cameron@csc-scc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 542-9350

## Bidder Information

* This is an Invitation to Tender notice
* The contract involves the provision of Community Residential Facility (CRF) services
* Interested suppliers must submit a statement of capabilities to demonstrate their qualifications and experience
* The closing date for submitting statements of capabilities is December 30, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
